segments.text: Did you get Bean's ten different good luck forwards , like that one from the Dalai Lama ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I deleted all that superstitious crap . What a waste of bandwidth !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I figured I might as well send one or two of them out . Maybe my luck will get better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you really think the Dalai Lama sent that ? I'm tired of all these forwards .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's worth a shot . Maybe we'll get some luck in thinking up something for this case .
segments.speaker: S1
